item.description:
One of our members kindly pointed out that Cassidy Hill is closed for the season until April, so I've switched the location to Sharpe Hill Vineyard in Pomfret/Hampton.

A wine tasting on a cold winter's day :)  There is a small fee for the tasting, depending on how many wines you would like to taste, beginning at 5$
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet in the tasting room
item.why: Since Cassidy Hill is apparently closed til April we'll try Sharpe Hill, and it should be pleasant to meet new people and sample some good wine. Hopefully the weather will agree with us for getting there, after all this snow and ice!

group.name: The NorthEast Connecticut Friends Meetup Group

item.name: A Wine Tasting at Sharpe Hill Vineyard
